perturbation.original_text: 4.	GOVERNING LAW. This Agreement and any matters arising out of or related to this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada. If any action is brought among the parties with respect to this Agreement or otherwise, by way of a claim or counterclaim, the parties agree that in any such action, and on all issues, the parties irrevocably waive their right to a trial by jury. Exclusive jurisdiction and venue for any such action shall be the State Courts of Nevada.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.	GOVERNING LAW. This Agreement and any matters arising out of or related to this Agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada. Exclusive jurisdiction and venue for any such action shall be the State Courts of Nevada. If any action is brought among the parties with respect to this Agreement or otherwise, by way of a claim or counterclaim, the parties agree that in any such action, and on all issues, the parties may consider waiving their right to a trial by jury.
perturbation.explanation: The change replaces 'irrevocably waive their right to a trial by jury' with 'parties may consider waiving their right to a trial by jury', removing the mandatory waiver and introducing ambiguity. This makes the waiver optional, potentially undermining its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: 7th Amendment to the United States Constitution (right to a jury trial), Contract Law regarding enforceability of waivers.

perturbation.original_text: 11.	ATTORNEYS’ FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney’s fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.changed_text: 11.	ATTORNEYS’ FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party may be entitled to recover reasonable attorney’s fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'will be entitled' to 'may be entitled', the entitlement of the prevailing party to recover attorney's fees becomes discretionary rather than mandatory. This introduces uncertainty and weakens the enforceability of the attorney's fees provision, as a court could interpret this as not requiring the losing party to pay the prevailing party's fees.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law regarding the enforcement of contractual provisions, specifically attorney's fees clauses.

perturbation.original_text: 10.	SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this Agreement or its application to any Person or circumstances is held to be unenforceable or invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, its other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will be interpreted so as best reasonably to effect the intent of the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.	SEVERABILITY. If any provision of this Agreement or its application to any Person or circumstances is held to be unenforceable or invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, all other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will also be considered unenforceable.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'its other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will be interpreted so as best reasonably to effect the intent of the parties' to 'all other applications and the remaining provisions of this Agreement will also be considered unenforceable' directly contradicts the principle of severability. Severability clauses are designed to ensure that the rest of the contract remains valid if one part is found invalid. This change renders the entire contract questionable if any single provision is challenged, making the whole agreement less enforceable.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law regarding severability and the preservation of contractual agreements.
